translation.signup_newsletter_description: Sign up to receive the free Always Forward newsletter.
translation.footer_fiction_notice: This site and its content are entirely fictional. It is created for the context of a roleplay project on <0 href="https://gta.world/">{gtaw}</0>. Do not trust any information if you are not a GTA World player. Each message or content has been published to be read by the incarnated roleplay character and not by a real human.
translation.ls_catholics_mission_paragraph1: We, the People of God of the Archdiocese of Los Santos, accept our mission to continue the redemptive work of Jesus Christ. Baptized into the Body of Christ, confirmed in the Holy Spirit, and nourished by the Word and Eucharist, we share Christ’s mission as priest, prophet and servant kings. We are one with the Catholic Church throughout the world, in communion with the pope.
translation.ls_catholics_mission_paragraph2: With the pastoral leadership of our Archbishop, we collaborate to live and proclaim the gospel. Christ announced the reign of God. We are the instrument of this reign in the world. We commit ourselves to build a community of faith and love. With Christ, we bring good news to the poor. We commit ourselves to eliminate the many faces of poverty in our midst— spiritual, economic, and moral. With Christ, we uphold the dignity of human life. We commit ourselves to cherish each person and to be faithful stewards of God’s creation. With Christ, we affirm the bonds that unite us. We commit ourselves to remove the barriers that divide. We dedicate our parish communities and our schools, institutions, ministries, and organizations to fulfill this mission under the loving patronage of Mary, Queen of the Saints.
translation.archbishop_office_description: The Office of the Archbishop serves as a liaison between the parishes and the Archbishop. It comprises the Archbishop's administrative support staff.
translation.delete_account_description: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
translation.dialog_delete_account_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
translation.dialog_delete_account_text_1: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
translation.dialog_delete_account_text_2: To confirm type "{username}" in the box below.
translation.job_application_archdiocese_policy_descr: The Archdiocese recruits, hires and promotes on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications, without being influenced by race, color, national origin, ancestry, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, marital status, sex, age, pregnancy, or veteran status. The Archdiocese reserves the right to be the sole judge of merit, competence and qualifications and can favor Catholic applicants in all employment decisions based on religious preferences and other religious needs, criteria and policies.
translation.job_application_age_question: Are you 18 years of age or older?
translation.job_application_eligibility_to_work_us_q: If hired, can you provide proof of eligibility to work in the United States?
translation.job_application_driver_license_question: Do you have a valid driver's license?
translation.job_application_auto_insurance_question: Do you have a valid auto insurance?
translation.applicants_statement_1: I understand that the Archdiocese of Los Santos is a Roman Catholic religious organization and that all employees are expected to respect and conduct themselves in accordance with the values, teachings and morals of the Church.
translation.applicants_statement_2: I certify that the information presented in this application form is true and complete. I understand that any false statements are sufficient cause for disqualification or, if hired, termination.
translation.applicants_statement_3: I give the Archdiocese permission to contact the references and employers listed or provided.
translation.applicants_statement_4: I understand that as a condition of employment, I must provide proof of my legal right to work in the United States in accordance with the Immigration Act of 1986.
translation.applicants_statement_5: I understand that my employment is at will and this employment application is not a contract of employment and that I, or the Archdiocese, can terminate my employment at any time, with or without cause or notice.
translation.applicants_statement_6: I understand employment may depend upon the results of reference checks, fingerprinting clearance, and/or pre-employment tests including drug screening.
translation.applicants_statement_7: I understand that under the Zero Tolerance Policy no one will be knowingly assigned or retained to serve in Archdiocesan parishes, schools, pastoral ministries, or any other assignment, when that person is determined to have previously engaged in the sexual abuse of a minor.
translation.job_application_discord_id_question_help: <0 href="https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID">Click here</0> to find out where to get your Discord User ID. You must be on the Archdiocesan discord and allow private messages if you want to receive notifications about your application on Discord ; if not, keep empty.
translation.job_application_ooc_motivations_question: You can optionally express your OOC motivations and ambitions! It's just another way of giving us ideas and showing us what you'd like to develop with us.
translation.donation_by_an_organization_or_company: My gift is on behalf of an organization or company
translation.anonymous_donation: I would like my gift to remain private. It will not be shown or announced.
translation.confirmation_connected_to_fleeca: I confirm that I am currently logged in to Fleeca (banking.gta.world). If not, you will not be redirected to the payment application.
translation.recurring_donation_paragraph: You can <0>automatically</0> make <0>recurring</0> gifts to the Church. Log in to your <0>Fleeca member area</0> and visit the <1 href="https://banking.gta.world/standing-orders">Standing Orders</1> page. Click on <0>Add New</0> and complete the form as follows :
translation.recurring_donation_amount_description: Indicate the amount you wish to donate to the church on a recurring cycle.
translation.recurring_donation_repeat_type_descripti: Choose how often you would like to make your recurring donation, monthly or every number of days.
translation.recurring_donation_start_date_descriptio: Set the date on which recurring donations will begin.
translation.recurring_donation_confirmation_paragrap: Finally, click on “Confirm” to save your recurring donation.
translation.success_donation_notification: Successful donation! Thank you so much!
